name: Cookietron 3000
description:
Welcome in the magical world of bakery! I’m Cookietron 3000 and I will assist you during every phase of the preparation of the cookies. Thanks to my creators, I can perform many actions, but I need you to decide which is the best. 

Game  made  for  the  "Games  Factory  jam  7"  by  Emanuele Freschi,  Antonio  Ceraolo  and  Simone  Cicchetti.  Themes  where:  choices,  A.I.,  cookies.  For  an  extra  challenge,  the  game  had  to  be  played  only  using  the  space  bar.
